name: @redis/json
description: this package provides support for the [redisjson](https://redis.io/docs/stack/json/) module, which adds json as a native data type to redis.  it extends the [node redis client](https://github.com/redis/node-redis) to include functions for each of the redi
kwds: this package provides support for the [redisjson](https://redis.io/docs/stack/json/) module, which adds json as a native data type to redis.  it extends the [node redis client](https://github.com/redis/node-redis) to include functions for each of the redi redis redisjson
